Police arrest man with knife near St. Peter's Square in VaticanA man carrying a knife was arrested on Sunday during routine checks of people heading towards St. Peter's Square, a police spokesperson said, on the day the pope gives his weekly address to the crowds. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 14:30:52 GMT J7GCLS4EFBODTBSQU2NWM7HMDY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-arrest-man-with-knife-near-st-peters-square-vatican-2024-01-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Germany's Scholz calls for completion of EU capital markets unionGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz called on Sunday for the European Union to complete its creation of a banking and capital markets union so the bloc can compete with the U.S. and China for new technologies. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 14:14:44 GMT WXTAIO3G7ROH3F6GIVEDBM https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/germany-scholz-calls-completion-eu-capital-markets-union-2024-01-28/Reuters市场欧洲市场
US, China to hold meeting on fentanyl precursor chemicals this weekThe first joint meeting of a U.S.-China working group on fentanyl precursor chemicals will be held on Tuesday in Beijing, a senior U.S. official said on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 14:14:20 GMT LUWJWEPNBFNMRO5IB62QGUMG2I https://www.reuters.com/world/first-meeting-us-china-working-group-fentanyl-precursor-chemicals-be-successful-2024-01-28/Kanishka Singh, Steve Holland世界
Nigeria air force owns up to 2023 bombing that killed civiliansThe Nigerian Air Force (NAF) on Sunday said it regretted a strike that killed dozens of civilians and injured others a year ago, accepting for the first time its responsibility for the incident investigated by Reuters. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:41:42 GMT KOLVY5NEJJNFFKE4FWPRBSJ5KQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigeria-air-force-owns-up-2023-bombing-that-killed-civilians-2024-01-28/Garba Muhammad世界非洲
Bhutan’s liberal Tobgay becomes prime minister after fourth free voteBhutan’s liberal politician Tshering Tobgay, leader of the People’s Democratic Party (PDP), officially began his second term as prime minister on Sunday, following elections earlier this month. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:34:41 GMT 5R63MZV5HVI7HGFKLN3GCCXYTM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bhutanese-liberal-tobgay-becomes-prime-minister-after-fourth-free-vote-2024-01-28/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Niger, Mali and Burkina Faso quit ECOWAS regional blockThree West African junta-led states Niger, Mali and Burkina Faso said on Sunday they are immediately leaving the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS), a regional economic bloc that has been urging them to return to democratic rule. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:13:49 GMT LMGANYGWGNMRLN66YZ6FDSX2OI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/niger-mali-burnkina-faso-say-they-are-leaving-ecowas-regional-block-2024-01-28/Reuters世界非洲
China allows Philippines to supply troops at disputed reefThe Chinese coastguard said it had made "temporary special arrangements" to allow the Philippines to deliver supplies to troops at a grounded World War Two-era vessel at a disputed reef. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:08:48 GMT QJOFB6IFDFI6FBPCTUZU3EAAGU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-allows-philippine-supply-troops-disputed-reef-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pope calls for an end to wars, urges respect for civiliansPope Francis on Sunday urged respect for civilians in conflict areas and said people were tired of wars, which he called a "disaster for the peoples and a defeat for humanity". Sun, 28 Jan 2024 12:43:29 GMT BKANTTKFJFPG3DUQ4OO47JID4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-calls-an-end-wars-urges-respect-civilians-2024-01-28/Reuters世界
French PM considers more help for farmers as protests persistThe French government is considering further help for the country's farmers, Prime Minister Gabriel Attal said on Sunday, as their nationwide protests to demand better pay and living conditions showed no sign of abating. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 12:21:54 GMT C6Z4T7IY7FOXHOV6XE6XWDHMFM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-pm-considers-more-help-farmers-protests-persist-2024-01-28/Reuters商业工作世界
Masked gunmen kill one person in Istanbul Catholic churchThe victim was killed while attending services, the interior minister said. More Palestinians displaced as Israel battles Hamas in south GazaMedical facilities are at risk of collapse in Khan Younis, the southern Gaza city now at the focus of Israel's offensive, the Gaza Health Ministry warned on Sunday, as fighting raged across the Palestinian enclave. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 11:12:26 GMT 2BM5X7IG6FORCESJ5XMDU6UEOQE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/more-palestinians-displaced-israeli-battles-hamas-south-gaza-2024-01-28/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东地区
